text: Don Emilio Pucci, Marchese di Barsento (; 20 November 1914 â€“ 29 November 1992) was an Italian aristocrat, fashion designer and politician. He and his eponymous company are known for their use of kaleidoscope of colors. He was also a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1963 to 1972. ==References== Category:1914 births Category:1992 deaths Category:Politicians from Naples Category:Politicians from Florence Category:Italian fashion designers
title: Emilio Pucci
